statement.p: In 18.75 of the last 32 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{32}}={0.1875}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{32}. \displaystyle{P}={0.1875}\cdot{32}={6}. We round that as requested to 6 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
